citation.case_name: Pti Technologies, Inc. v. Pall Corporation Technologies, Inc

html:
535 U.S. 1109

PTI TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
v.
PALL CORPORATION TECHNOLOGIES, INC.

No. 01-677.

Supreme Court of the United States.

June 3, 2002.

1

C. A. Fed. Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Festo Corp. v. Shoketsu Kinzoku Kogyo Kabushiki Co., ante, p. 722. Reported below: 259 F. 3d 1383.
